QuestData.Title: Stolen Shipments
QuestData.Description:
Tha shipments from Shiri and Zen'kala keep comin' in, we can barely keep up! But one of my workers thinks I won't notice if he shaves a little off the top.
The goblins here have been workin' on a little device to help make a mess of this thief: an exploding pie.
Look for Kanyaku and throw one straight at him. I'm sure he's makin' mischief somewhere.
QuestData.LogDescription: Throw the explosive pie at the thief and retrieve $1oa Shipment.
